page.title: 11Project Trust
page.content: Project was set up in 1968 to help the new generation of Britons to gain some understanding of the third world. The founder and director of Project Trust is Major Nicholas Maclean_ Bristol.The four main continents where Project Trust volunteers work are Africa,South America,Asia and Australia.Volunteers work as Teacher_aides in Social Service and Adventure work.They are between 171/2 and 19.At first they are invited to a selection course on Coll and each volunteer is assessed. Successful Candidates are then matched with particular Projects. Each Volunteer has to raise Â£1250 towards the cost of going abroad. Volunteers spend a year working abroad and it usual for them to be between school and college.
